dev-1.x.name: drupal/ldap_authz

security-coverage.message: Dev releases are not covered by Drupal security advisories.

dev-1.x.description: LDAP Authorization is used for granting users Drupal roles based on LDAP data such as what OU (Organizational Unit) they are in, what LDAP groups they are members of, what attributes their LDAP account has etc.  It does not require the user authenticates with their LDAP credentials though this is the common implementation; other authentication methods may be used provided a relationship can be established between the Drupal username or email address and the LDAP.

security-coverage.message: Alpha releases are not covered by Drupal security advisories.

1.0.0-alpha1.description: LDAP Authorization is used for granting users Drupal roles based on LDAP data such as what OU (Organizational Unit) they are in, what LDAP groups they are members of, what attributes their LDAP account has etc.  It does not require the user authenticates with their LDAP credentials though this is the common implementation; other authentication methods may be used provided a relationship can be established between the Drupal username or email address and the LDAP.
